switch.name: fcc/lsas/left-out-active
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/lsas-left-out eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-1-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/sys-2-psi ge 2200
fcc/fcc2-power eq 1 /systems/failures/fcc/lsas-left-out ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/left-in-active
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/lsas-left-in eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-2-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/sys-3-psi ge 2200
fcc/fcc1-power eq 1 /systems/failures/fcc/lsas-left-in ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/right-in-active
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/lsas-right-in eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-1-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/sys-3-psi ge 2200
fcc/fcc2-power eq 1 /systems/failures/fcc/lsas-right-in ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/right-out-active
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/lsas-right-out eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-1-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/sys-2-psi ge 2200
fcc/fcc1-power eq 1 /systems/failures/fcc/lsas-right-out ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/spd-prot/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active eq 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 1 position/wow eq 1 attitude/pitch-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/pitch-rad lt -0.20944 attitude/roll-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad lt -0.558505 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-speed-kt le /fms/speeds/vmo-mmo

switch.name: fcc/lsas/alpha-prot/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active eq 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 1 position/wow eq 1 attitude/pitch-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/pitch-rad lt -0.20944 attitude/roll-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad lt -0.558505 aero/alpha-deg-damped le fcc/no-stall-warn-alpha-deg

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pah/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 fcc/lsas/spd-prot/active ne 1 fcc/lsas/alpha-prot/active ne 1 attitude/pitch-rad le 0.523599 attitude/pitch-rad ge -0.174533 attitude/roll-rad le 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.558505 fcc/lsas/in-detent eq 1 position/wow eq 0 /position/gear-agl-ft ge 100

switch.name: fcc/lsas/prd/active
switch.test:
fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0
fcc/lsas/in-detent eq 0 attitude/roll-rad gt 0.558505 attitude/roll-rad lt -0.558505 /position/gear-agl-ft lt 100
position/wow eq 0

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pap/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 position/wow eq 1

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pnl/active
switch.test: fcc/lsas/channels-active gt 0 fcc/afs/enabled eq 0 gear/unit[1]/WOW eq 1 gear/unit[2]/WOW eq 1 spoilers/auto-speedbrake-feedback gt 0

switch.name: fcc/yaw/avail-upper-a
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/yd-upper-a eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-1-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/nrmp/sys-2-to-sys-1 ge 2200
/systems/electrical/bus/dc-3 ge 24 /systems/failures/fcc/yd-upper-a ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/yaw/avail-upper-b
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/yd-upper-b eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-1-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/nrmp/sys-2-to-sys-1 ge 2200
/systems/electrical/bus/dc-3 ge 24 /systems/failures/fcc/yd-upper-b ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/yaw/avail-lower-a
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/yd-lower-a eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-2-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/nrmp/sys-3-to-sys-2 ge 2200
/systems/electrical/bus/dc-1 ge 24 /systems/failures/fcc/yd-lower-a ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/yaw/avail-lower-b
switch.test:
/controls/fcc/switches/yd-lower-b eq 1
/systems/hydraulics/sys-2-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/nrmp/sys-3-to-sys-2 ge 2200
/systems/electrical/bus/dc-1 ge 24 /systems/failures/fcc/yd-lower-b ne 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1

switch.name: fcc/yaw/active
switch.test: fcc/yaw/avail-upper-a eq 1 fcc/yaw/avail-upper-b eq 1 fcc/yaw/avail-lower-a eq 1 fcc/yaw/avail-lower-b eq 1

switch.name: fcc/rcws/sys-1-active
switch.test:
/it-autoflight/input/ovrd1 eq 0
/systems/hydraulics/sys-2-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/sys-3-psi ge 2200
fcc/fcc1-power eq 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1 fcc/yaw/channels-active gt 0 /systems/acconfig/options/rcws-equipped eq 1 /position/gear-agl-ft ge 500

switch.name: fcc/rcws/sys-2-active
switch.test:
/it-autoflight/input/ovrd2 eq 0
/systems/hydraulics/sys-1-psi ge 2200 /systems/hydraulics/sys-3-psi ge 2200
fcc/fcc2-power eq 1 /systems/iru-common/any-aligned-out eq 1 fcc/yaw/channels-active gt 0 /systems/acconfig/options/rcws-equipped eq 1 /position/gear-agl-ft ge 500

switch.name: fcc/rcws/in-detent
switch.test: /controls/flight/aileron lt 0.02 /controls/flight/aileron gt -0.02 fcc/rcws/input lt 0.02 fcc/rcws/input gt -0.02
/controls/flight/aileron gt 0.045 /controls/flight/aileron lt -0.045 fcc/rcws/input gt 0.045 fcc/rcws/input lt -0.045

channel.name: FCC: Pitch Axis and LSAS

switch.name: fcc/lsas/pnl/output
switch.test: fcc/lsas/pnl/active eq 1 fcs/spoiler-left-feedback gt 10 fcs/spoiler-right-feedback gt 10

pid.name: fcc/lsas/spd-prot/vc-kts-rate
pid.descripton: Use D only to calculate rate of IAS

pure_gain.name: fcc/elevator-feel/afs-output
pure_gain.description: Schedule the AFS the same as yoke for when AFS is disconnected with yoke movement

channel.switch:
fcc/lsas/pah/active eq 0
fcc/lsas/pah/output ge fcc/lsas/out-of-trim-threshold fcc/lsas/pah/output le -fcc/lsas/out-of-trim-threshold
fcc/lsas/pah/output lt 0.01 fcc/lsas/pah/output gt -0.01 -

switch.name: fcc/lsas/autotrim-switch
switch.test: fcc/lsas/autotrim-inhibit eq 0 fcc/lsas/pah/active eq 1 fcc/lsas/out-of-trim eq 1 fcc/lsas/pah/output gt 0.001 /controls/flight/elevator-trim le 0.064516 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.0890118 attitude/roll-rad le 0.0890118

fcc/lsas/autotrim-inhibit eq 0 fcc/lsas/pah/active eq 1 fcc/lsas/out-of-trim eq 1 fcc/lsas/pah/output lt -0.001 /controls/flight/elevator-trim ge -1.0 attitude/roll-rad ge -0.0890118 attitude/roll-rad le 0.0890118

channel.name: FCC: Yaw Axis and Yaw Damper

switch.name: /controls/flight/auto-slat-cmd
switch.test: aero/alpha-deg-damped ge fcc/stall-alpha-deg position/wow eq 0 /controls/flight/flaps-input eq 0

switch.name: /controls/flight/slats-cmd-limited
switch.test: /systems/electrical/bus/ac-3 ge 112 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-mach le 0.55 /controls/flight/auto-slat-timer gt 0 position/wow eq 0 /controls/flight/flaps-input eq 0

switch.name: /gear/abs/active
switch.test: /gear/abs/armed-avail eq 1 /gear/abs/mode ne 0 /gear/abs/spoilers-cmd-deg gt 0 position/wow eq 1 /instrumentation/airspeed-indicator/indicated-speed-kt ge 53

pid.name: /gear/abs/decel-rate-kts
pid.descripton: Use D only to calculate rate of decel
